volumeChange()

Listens to the volume change event to get or set the volume or muted property.

FYI: Keep in mind videojs loadMedia calls a reset method that triggers a volumechange event before loading the next media.

Source:
  • utils/SRGUserStorage.js, line 252
See:

  • videojs loadMedia

Listens to Events:
  • PlayerEvents.event:VOLUME_CHANGE
